title: Look At the Table
text: Notice that the table has $$10$$ listed for the $$x$$ value for green. This is due to the fact that if you spin a green, you win $10. Therefore, red must align with what happens if you spin a red.

title: Determining Red's $$x$$
text: What is the $$x$$ value for red? Reminder that red is associated with pay, which is a negative number.
